name: tm13
effect: Teaches Ice Beam to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Ice Beam to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Snore)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.
